attributes.action: prevent Jacqui Smith from obtaining a Peerage and a seat in the House Of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The disgraceful theft  of Tax payers' money by the ex Minister Jacqui Smith in her designation of first/second homes muust not be rewarded by a Peerage and a seat in the noble House of Lords.

Her expense claims whilst in Office as Home Secretaary/MP should be investigated by HM Revenue and Customs

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
